famous_compare.compare_header: Select a celebrity and find out how you look alike or press the 'Random' button
famous_compare.tooltip_text: You can find out how similar you are to a random celebrity out of about 200K by pressing the 'Random' button.
famous_compare.validity_alert: Please make sure you select an image.

home.validity_alert: Please select an image for mother, father and the child.
home.select_warning: Please select a celebrity by typing its name.
home.avatar_warning: Please be sure you select an image!
home.top_label: Find out which celebrity you are.
home.face_not_found: No face found in the photo you selected.
home.more_than_one_face_found: Please make sure there is only one face in the photo you chose.
home.loading_text: Our artificial intelligence algorithm is looking for the celebrity who looks most like you.
home.loading_text_2: Our artificial intelligence algorithm is calculating the similarity rate between you and the selected celebrity.

result.very_similar: and you are very similar to each other!
result.first_similar: Similarity ratio of the most similar celebrity to you
result.second_similar: Similarity ratio of the 2. most similar celebrity to you
result.third_similar: Similarity ratio of the 3. most similar celebrity to you

saved.select: Select the photos you want to delete
saved.not_found: There is no any photo saved.

starter.label1: Find out which celebrity you look like with artificial intelligence algorithms.
starter.label2: The similarity is provided by the artificial intelligence algorithm powered by TURK AI.
starter.kvkk_text: Protection of Personal Data Disclosure(KVKK) text.
starter.read_and_accept: I have read and accept the
starter.web_view_alert_text: Be sure to read and accept the Protection of Personal Data Disclosure Text and the Privacy Policy.

dashboard.first_label: Find out which celebrity do you look like
dashboard.second_label: Pick a celebrity and find out how similar you are
dashboard.showcase_title: See yourself on the leaderboard by signing in!
dashboard.showcase_meta_title: You can find your long-lost lookalike twin by signing in and enabling face sharing

update.not_up_to_date: The application is out of date
update.update_the_app: Please update the 'Which Celebrity' app before continuing.

error.in_progress: Signing in progress error, please try again
error.not_available: Play services not available at the moment
error.error: An error occurred while signing in. Please try again.
error.time_out: Your session has ended. You can sign in again.
error.permission: There was an error opening the face
error.switch: There was an error while switching your face sharing option.

drawer.tooltip:
If the face sharing option is enabled, we can find your long lost lookalike twin :)

Also you can be displayed in the scoreboard of the users that look like celebrities the most.

Your face will not be shared with any organization or institution.

scoreboard.most_similar: Users that are most similar to celebrities
scoreboard.most_similar_selected: Top 10 users that are most similar to selected celebrity
